talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter:
A reviewer I used to follow once put out a scathing review of V1 calling Sorawo "the quintessential LN protag" and it was so baffling that it became a minor running joke between me and some friends lol.

Same review also bemoaned Kozakura and her "little-sister affectations"

talk.author: did:plc:g52aevwvwnqazaztqmd6tsmc
talk.utter: they read the secret version of the novel where Sorawo is normal

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter:
They also did not seem aware that the story was a romance, because they kept moaning about "man Sorawo's freaking out so much over just making a friend, what's the big deal" lol

Especially bizarre because this was a person who'd read plenty of yuri

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter:
They also did not seem aware that the story was a romance, because they kept moaning about "man Sorawo's freaking out so much over just making a friend, what's the big deal" lol

talk.author: did:plc:jhbkzsmpqj6vc5f2dmt2nff7
talk.utter: Even putting romance aside, she'd have plenty of reason to be making a big deal out of having a friend, given that she'd never really had one, lol.

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter: This person was *completely* incurious about why Sorawo is the way she is, lol. Just kind of assumed that the only reason Sorawo is depicted as a reclusive weirdo who has no friends and crawls around derelict buildings is "LN Protagonist" and stops there.

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter: This person was *completely* incurious about why Sorawo is the way she is, lol. Just kind of assumed that the only reason Sorawo is depicted as a reclusive weirdo who has no friends and crawls around derelict buildings is "LN Protagonist" and stops there.

talk.author: did:plc:uypytbqy5palhmhbvvezgrww
talk.utter: And it's not like there was even any extrapolation required! They drop the cult stuff in the first book! It's right there!

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter: To this day I remain pretty convinced that this person (who I had actually paid to review V1) got bored and quit halfway through and didn't want to admit it, because their review just straight up does not mention the cult stuff *at all* lol.

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw

talk.author: did:plc:yezjmch53wfkkmm7i3hiccua
talk.utter: Honestly pretty wild that someone would actually do that, it's not like it takes that long to read a single light novel volume... Like I've read some stuff that I really ended up disliking but even then I still at least finished the first volume, and I'm just reading for fun!

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter: Honestly I'd been pretty mixed on this person's criticism for a while before this so coming away from a paid commission genuinely wondering "....did this dude even read the thing" was a clear sign that it was time to go lol
